text: There is now an <https://github.com/JuliaPackaging/Yggdrasil/pull/2342|Yggdrasil> build for the <https://github.com/mariusmuja/flann|Fast Library for Approximate Nearest Neighbors (FLANN)> in case that is useful to anyone

in case that is useful to anyone

text: That's cool! Now we only need a wrapper package right?

elements.text: That's cool! Now we only need a wrapper package right?

text: Yeah, I built it as a step towards being able to build PCL. It was listed as a dependency.
